title: My Main account was hacked and transfered
body: My main account was hacked and transferred to Turkey, my attempts to get control of the account have failed i can't seem to log onto it. The summoner name on the account is FMF. I have contacted riot support and got a response from Riot turkey but considering there is a language barrier i would like to deal with North American support. If there is any way to lock the account and get it back to NA i would really appreciate it.

replies.body: Go ahead and reach out to us in another [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but this time do **not** sign in. Remain logged out when you submit the ticket and be sure to choose "I need help recovering my account". That way you should be able to get through to an NA agent!
